name: Rawlings
description: Rawlings Sporting Goods is an American sports equipment manufacturing company based in Town and Country, Missouri. Founded in 1887, Rawlings currently specializes in baseball clothing and equipment, producing gloves, bats, balls, protective gear, batting helmets, uniforms, bags.

name: Wilson
description: The Wilson Sporting Goods Company is an American sports equipment manufacturer based in Chicago, Illinois. From 1989, it has been a subsidiary of the Finnish group Amer Sports, since 2019 itself a subsidiary of the Chinese group ANTA Sports.

name: E7
description: E7 Baseball Bats is a company that offers handcrafted baseball bats and gloves. Our goal is to provide our customers with the highest quality, which is why we carefully select every piece of wood and every product receives special attention. Every bat is rubbed with hard steel to guarantee a better pop.
